Package paoo.game.main

Class UtilityTool

java.lang.Object
paoo.game.main.UtilityTool
public class UtilityTool extends Object
Utility class providing helper methods for image processing and manipulation. This class contains static utility methods that can be used throughout the game for common image operations.

  • Method Details

    • scaleImage

      public BufferedImage scaleImage(BufferedImage original, int width, int height)
      Scales a BufferedImage to the specified dimensions.

      This method creates a new BufferedImage with the target width and height, then draws the original image scaled to fit those dimensions. The scaling uses bilinear interpolation for smooth results.

      The resulting image maintains ARGB color model with alpha channel support, making it suitable for images with transparency.

      Parameters:
      original - the original BufferedImage to be scaled
      width - the target width in pixels for the scaled image
      height - the target height in pixels for the scaled image
      Returns:
      a new BufferedImage scaled to the specified dimensions
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if width or height is less than or equal to 0
      NullPointerException - if the original image is null
      See Also:
      • BufferedImage
      • Graphics.drawImage(Image, int, int, int, int, java.awt.image.ImageObserver)
